message.body: Omg omg big news flash!!! Ben is returning to school. He isn't with our class since he's behind so I think he will be with you!!!!!!!

But I have some very sad news I literally just got. Haven't seen Laura Kuhl and just texted her. She had to withdraw again in Feb. She is recovering from a car crash that really hurt her foot. 2 surgeries and she can't walk until next month! She is ok but
Oh my i'm so glad she's ok and hope she heals quickly
She seems in good spirits. It's sad for you both! I wanted to tell you.
